name: OHDOSO
overview:
OHDOSO is an OTT Broadcast provider that has assembled one of the Worldâ€™s largest Internet Entertainment Delivery Network that is capable of delivering a Socially Interactive Entertainment Experience to hundreds of millions of users Worldwide. We will initially provide IP VOD, but eventually move into providing broadcast channels via IP on a global basis.

Additionally, we have built a proprietary asset management and analytic engine with behavioral recommendations to support this distribution platform, partnered with social networking API hooks back into Facebook/MySpace. Also, we will have unique targeted Content Genres that we are supporting that have yet to be addressed by the OTT or IPTV provider market.
